TopicTitle: Which one of the Dev's made the SLS parts?

Articles.Content: We all know that Nova, Claira, C7 and B9 have all had a hand in the making of parts for this game. But today I was just giving it some thought and I was curious as to which Dev made the SLS parts?
From the devnote tuesdays, it seems like C7 did the parts.

We all know that Nova, Claira, C7 and B9 have all had a hand in the making of parts for this game. But today I was just giving it some thought and I was curious as to which Dev made the SLS parts?

It was Chad, in this case. But, considering me and B9 aren't on the team anymore, and Claira's been away for college, your list doesn't really present any other valid options anyway
From my perspective, alle the Devs (if active or former ones) did a great Job on KSP. They shaped what makes my day... every day.
Guess I haven't been paying much attention lately. Since when did B9 no longer work at Squad?

Guess I haven't been paying much attention lately. Since when did B9 no longer work at Squad?

I think that he left straight after doing the space centre.

Guess I haven't been paying much attention lately. Since when did B9 no longer work at Squad?

It was a while back. He got too busy with his real job, as this was a side gig.

I was quite curious if it was a new content designer that Squad may have hired, as they put up a post saying that they were looking for a new one. But, now that I've found out it was C7 that did the new parts, I congratulate him, for he did a great job!

Edited April 3, 2014 by Woopert
